CustomField.description: Annual compliance check conducted through an in-person site visit (by staff or contracted out to a third party) to ensure the subject property still contains the IMIT-eligible use and there has been no reduction in the Gross Floor Area for that use. Then, a confirmation memo is drafted confirming this.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Annual compliance check conducted through an in-person site visit (by staff or contracted out to a third party) to ensure the subject property still contains the IMIT-eligible use and there has been no reduction in the Gross Floor Area for that use.
CustomField.label: Continued Eligible Use (attach memo)
